name: Heart Starts Pounding w/ Kaelyn Moore

episodes.title: 107. Starvation Cult Uncovered in Backwoods of Kenya
episodes.description:
In 2024, over 600 bodies were found buried in shallow graves on a compound in the Shakahola forest. Paul Mackenzie had told his followers if they reduced their food intake, they would meet Jesus. This left many with the question - how did things get this bad?

Trigger Warning: Child abuse 

Other HSP Episodes on High Control Groups:

Trapped: Man Kept Family in Secret Room For Years Waiting For The End Of The World
https://youtu.be/923YlA2Rg9Y

Vanished In The Wilderness Parts 1 & 2 (The Colonia Dignidad Cult)
Pt 1. https://youtu.be/QVzmg-z8oqs
Pt 2. https://youtu.be/p7RRvYohp3w

episodes.title: 32: Vanished in The Wilderness Pt 1: The Professor Disappears
episodes.description:
When Boris Weisfeiler embarked on a solo vacation to Chile, he never returned. What came next was a deeper and darker rabbit hole than anyone could have ever expected

episodes.title: 33: Vanished in The Wilderness Pt. 2: The Cult
episodes.description: Why did Boris Weisfeiler disappear in 1985. And did the cult hiding out deep in the Chilean wilderness have anything to do with it? Today, we're exploring the Colonia Dignidad.
